name: Lil' Monsta
description: Each night, Minions choose who babysits Lil' Monsta's token & "is the Demon". A player dies each night*. [+1 Minion]
first_night_desc: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta.
other_night_desc: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta. Choose a player, that player dies.
